name: Restart Button for Firefox Add-Ons Manager
description: There are plenty of extensions and userstyles out there that add a restart option to Firefox via a toolbar button or menu option, but none that simply add a restart button to the Add-ons Manager. I prefer this configuration because it is simple, unobtrusive, and is accessible from the Add-ons Manager where it is most commonly needed.
additional_info: I created this style to work in conjunction with Firefox: Awesome Addons Manager, but it works equally well with the default Add-ons Manager. The developer has now incorporated the restart button into his style. If you're looking for an improved and compact Add-Ons Manager in addition to a restart button, I suggest you check out his style here. Version 1.0 - August 22, 2013 Tested on Firefox 23.0.1 and 24.0. Button text and appearance can be easily customized by following the instructions in the CSS.
